src:
Tipsters: Another frolic for Foxes!

01 Nov 2019, 14:31

Cape Town – Free-scoring Leicester City certainly won’t hit nine goals this time … but they should do enough to win anyway at another surprise-package team, Crystal Palace, on Sunday.
Their meeting - both currently within the top six - unusually tops the billing in many respects for the latest English Premiership programme, and the majority view of our tipsters is for the Foxes to come out on top.
Each round of the 2019/20 campaign, a group of our staff has a crack at predicting the results - do the exercise yourself, if you like, and see how you compare afterwards.
Compiled by Rob Houwing (Newcastle-partial), the others are Garrin Lambley (Everton, and defending champion), Lloyd Burnard, Tashreeq Vardien, Baden Gillion and Lynn Butler (all Man Utd) plus Craig Taylor (Liverpool).
Three points are awarded for an entirely correct score-line, and one for right result.

OUR FORECASTS:


BOURNEMOUTH v MANCHESTER UNITED

Saturday, 14:30

Rob: 0-1Garrin: 1-2Tashreeq: 1-2Lloyd: 2-0Lynn: 0-1Craig: 1-2Baden: 1-2
Last season: 1-2                          

SHEFFIELD UNITED v BURNLEY

Saturday, 17:00

Rob: 0-0Garrin: 1-1  Tashreeq: 1-0 Lloyd: 1-1Lynn: 2-0Craig: 2-1Baden: 1-0
Last season: Not applicable                                                         

ARSENAL v WOLVES

Saturday, 17:00

Rob: 2-1Garrin: 2-1Tashreeq:  2-1Lloyd: 3-0Lynn: 1-1Craig: 2-1Baden: 3-1
Last season: 1-1                                                 

MANCHESTER CITY v SOUTHAMPTON

Saturday, 17:00

Rob: 3-0Garrin: 4-0Tashreeq: 3-0 Lloyd: 2-0Lynn: 5-0Craig: 4-0Baden: 4-0
Last season: 6-1                                                   

WEST HAM v NEWCASTLE 

Saturday, 17:00

Rob: 1-0Garrin: 2-1Tashreeq: 2-0 Lloyd: 1-1Lynn: 3-1Craig: 1-1Baden: 1-0
Last season: 2-0                                                       

BRIGHTON v NORWICH

Saturday, 17:00

Rob: 2-0Garrin: 2-1Tashreeq: 1-1 Lloyd: 2-0Lynn: 2-1Craig: 1-0Baden: 2-1
Last season: Not applicable                                                        

ASTON VILLA v LIVERPOOL

Saturday, 17:00

Rob: 0-2Garrin: 0-2Tashreeq: 1-3Lloyd: 1-2Lynn: 1-2Craig: 1-3Baden: 1-1
Last season: Not applicable                   

WATFORD v CHELSEA

Saturday, 19:30

Rob: 0-2Garrin: 1-2Tashreeq: 1-0 Lloyd: 1-3 Lynn: 1-3Craig: 0-2Baden: 0-1
Last season: 1-2                                                             

CRYSTAL PALACE v LEICESTER

Sunday, 16:00

Rob: 1-1Garrin: 1-1Tashreeq: 0-2Lloyd: 0-2Lynn: 1-2Craig: 1-1Baden: 1-2
Last season: 1-0                                                        

EVERTON v TOTTENHAM

Sunday, 18:30

Rob: 1-1Garrin: 1-2Tashreeq: 1-2 Lloyd: 1-2Lynn: 1-3Craig: 1-2Baden: 2-3
Last season: 2-6        

LEADERBOARD

88 Garrin (11 points in last round)78 Tashreeq (7) 77 Baden (10)69 Rob (7)66 Lloyd (5)62 Lynn (8)57 Craig (14)
